definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sit, remain, dwell (NH id.; Aram. [[יְתֵיב]], yiteb; MI:10, MI:31 [[ישב]], l:8, l:19 [[וישב]], l:13 [[ואשב ]], dwell; Ph. [[ישב]] dwell; Zinj. [[ישב]] sit DHM:Sendsch. 58; As. ašâbu, sit, dwell, Dl:HWB 244; Ar. wa3aba leap, jump, Ḥimyer. dial. sit, Lane:2919; Eth. 0awsaba: II. 1 secum cohabitare facere, marry, consummate marriage, cf.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: sit on ([[עַל]]) a seat 1Sa 20:25, stone Ex 17:12, teraphim Ge 31:34, couch Ge 48:2 (all E), Ez Eze 23:41, knees 2Ki 4:20, throne Ex 11:5, Ex 12:29 (J), De 17:18, 1Sa 1:9, 1Sa 4:13, 1Ki 1:13, 1Ki 1:17, 1Ki 1:20 +, v. abs. infr.; of ´[[י]], [[הַיּשֵׁב עַל־חוּג הָאֶרֶץ]] Is 40:22; dust Is 47:1, ground ([[אֶרֶץ]]) Ez Eze 26:16, ashes Jon 3:6 (these in token of humiliation); sit down by ([[עַל]]) a well Ex 2:15 or pool 2Sa 2:13; c. [[אֶל]] 1Sa 28:23; sit in ([[ב]]) house, street, doorway, assembly, etc. 2Sa 7:1, Ju Jdg 19:15, Ge 38:14 (J), Je 15:17, Je 26:10, Ps 1:1, Ct So 2:3 so Ez Eze 31:6, Eze 31:17 (fig.); of No of Amon (personif. city) [[הַיּשְׁבָה בַּיְאׂרִים]] Na 3:8 she who sate amid the rivers; c. [[לְ]] sit on to (pregn.) [[לָאָרֶץ]] Is 3:26, Is 47:1, La 2:10, [[לְכִסֵּא]] Ps 9:5, at, [[לְפֶתַח בית]] Pr 9:14, ([[י]])[[לִימִינוֹ]] 1Ki 2:19, Ps 110:1; [[לַמַּבּוּל]] Ps 29:10; c. [[לִפְנֵי]] Ge 43:33 (J), + [[שָׁם]] Ju Jdg 20:26, Jdg 21:2, 2Sa 7:18 = 1Ch 17:16; c. [[עִם]] 1Sa 20:5, Pr 31:22; c. [[אֶת־]] Je 16:8, Job 2:13; c. [[תַּחַת]] Ju Jdg 6:11, Mic 4:4, [[וַיֵּשֶׁב]] [[תַּחְתֶּיהָ בַּצֵּל]] Jon 4:5; c. [[מִנֶּגֶד]] Ge 21:16; Ge 21:16 (E), [[נֶגֶד]] Is 47:14, [[מִקֶּדֶם לָעִיר]] Jon 4:5; [[מִצַּד]] 1Sa 20:25, Ru 2:14; c. acc. cogn. Ez Eze 28:2; [[לִשְׁפּׂט]] Ex 18:13, Joe 4:12 (cf. Ps 9:5, Is 28:6); hence abs. of sitting as king or judge Ex 18:14, Ps 61:8, Mal 3:3, [[יושׁבים]] Is 10:13, perh. Am 1:5, Am 1:8, esp. of ´[[י]] sitting (enthroned), Ps 2:4, Ps 9:8, Ps 29:10, Ps 55:20, Ps 102:13, La 5:19, so in [[כְּרוּבִים]]([[הַ]])[[ישֵׁב ]] 1Sa 4:4, 2Sa 6:2 = 1Ch 13:6, 2Ki 19:15, Ps 99:1; [[ישֵׁב תְּהִלּוֹת יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Ps 22:4 (v. c. [[עַל]], supr.); by meton. of thrones, for the judges sitting on them [[שָׁמָּה יׇֽשְׁבוּ כִסְאוֹת לְמִשְׁפָּט]] Ps 122:5; [[הַיּשְׁבִים]] Ru 4:14, i.e. in the gate (cf. v:Ru 4:11), those in whose presence purchase of land took place.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sit, sit down, abs., Ju Jdg 19:6, Ru 4:1, Ru 4:2, Ne 1:4, Je 36:15 (sq. cl. of purpose, to eat, etc.) Ge 37:25, Es 3:15 +; opp. [[קוּם]] Ex 32:6 (JE) Ps 139:2, [[מְאַחֲרֵי שֶׁבֶת]] Ps 127:2 (opp. [[מַשְׁכִּימֵי קוּם]]); so Is 37:28 = 2Ki 19:27 (rd. [[לְפָנַי קֻמְְ]] at end of v:2Ki 19:27 = 2Ki 19:26 We in Bl:Einl. 4, 257 Rs:Proph. 351, and n. 9); but also [[קוּמִי שְׁבִי]] Is 52:2, expl. by ([[וַיׇּקָם מֵהָאָרֶץ וַיֵּשֶׁב]] [[אֶל־הַמִּטָּה]] 1Sa 28:23 and) 2Sa 19:9. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sit down outside ([[חוּץ]]), i.e. perform a necessity of nature De 23:14. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: sit = be set (as a jewel), [[ישְׁבוֹתּ]] [[עַל־מִלֵּאת]] Ct So 5:12 set on a filling (i.e. in a setting, De al.), in description of eyes; (> others sitting by full streams).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: remain, stay, tarry (for a limited or indef. time), c. [[אֶת]] pers. Ge 24:55 (J), Ju Jdg 19:4, 2Sa 16:8; c. [[עִם]] pers. Ge 27:44 (J), [[עִמָּדִי]] Ge 29:19 (E), Ju Jdg 17:10; c. [[בְ]] loc. 1Sa 7:2 (of ark), 1Sa 13:16, 1Sa 14:2, 1Sa 24:4 (1Sa 23:25 rd. [[אֲשֶׁר]] for [[וַיֵּשֶׁב]] LXX We Dr Klo Kit Bu), 2Sa 10:5, 2Sa 19:25 (where rd. [[שִׁבְתּוֹ]] for [[שִׁיבָתוֹ]] Dr Klo Bu, v. We), Nu 35:25 (P), Job 24:13; c. [[שָׁם]] 1Ki 11:16, [[שָׁם עַד־עוֹלָם]] 1Sa 1:22; c. [[על]] (by) 1Sa 25:13, 1Sa 30:24; [[פּׂה]] 2Ki 7:4; [[שְׁבוּ לָכֶם פּׂה עִם־]] [[הַחֲמוֹר]] Ge 22:5 (E); c. [[בֵּין]] Ju Jdg 5:16, [[מִחוּץ לְ]] Le 14:8 (P), [[אֵחֶל]] 1Sa 20:19; c. acc. [[בית]] 2Sa 6:11, 2Sa 13:20, Ru 2:7; abs. 1Sa 1:23, 1Sa 1:23; abide, endure Mic 5:3, [[וְיהוּדָה לְעוֹלָם]] [[תֵּשֵׁב]] Joe 4:20, so of Mt. Zion Ps 121:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with special emphasis on qualifying phr., [[וַתֵּשֶׁב בְּאֵיתָן]] [[קַשְׁתּוֹ]] Ge 49:24 and his bow abode as a firm one (poem in J); 1Ki 22:1 and they continued three years without war; of woman remaining [[בִּדְמֵי טָהֳרָה]] Le 12:4, ´[[על־דמי וגו]] v:Le 12:5.

dwell, have one's abode in ([[ב]]) a land, city, house, etc., Ge 4:16, Ge 13:7, Ge 13:12, Ge 13:12, Ge 19:29, Ge 24:37, Ge 24:62, De 1:4, De 3:2, Jos 20:6, 2Sa 7:6 + oft. (on 2Sa 21:16 v. [[ישׁבו בְנׁב]], p. 444); in tents Je 35:7, Je 35:10, 1Ch 5:10; fig. of justice ([[חְדָקָה]]) Is 32:16 (‖[[וְשָׁכֵן מִשְׁפָּט]]); in the midst of ([[בְּקֶרֶב]]) Ge 24:3, Jos 13:13, Jos 16:10, Ju Jdg 1:30, Jdg 1:32, Jdg 1:33, Jdg 3:5; so c. [[בְּתוֹח]] Ge 23:10 (P); c. [[עַל]] + [[הארץ]], of God 1Ki 8:27 = 2Ch 6:18; of people Le 25:18; Le 25:19, Le 26:35 (H); c. [[לְ]] Job 15:28; c. [[בֵּין]] Ge 20:1 (E); dwell with ([[אֶת]]) Ge 34:16; Ge 34:22 (P), Ex 2:21 (E), Jos 15:63 (JE), Ju Jdg 1:16, Jdg 1:21, Jdg 17:11; [[יֵשְׁבוּ]] [[יְשָׁרִים אֶת־פָּנֶיְ]] Ps 140:14; so c. [[עִם]] Jos 20:4, De 23:17 (+ [[בקרב]]), Ps 26:4 (i.e. assoc. with); c. [[יַחְדָּו]] Ge 13:6, Ge 13:6 (J), Ge 36:7 (P), De 25:5; [[שֶׁבֶת גַּס־יׇ֑חַד]] Ps 133:1; dwell in their stead ([[תַּחְתָּם]]) De 2:12, De 2:12, De 2:22, De 2:23, 1Ch 4:41, 1Ch 5:22; abs. [[לָשֶׁבֶת יְחָרָהּ]] Is 45:18 for dwelling he formed it (the earth); (thy) dwelling-place is [[מְקוֹם שִׁבְתְְּ]] 1Ki 8:30 = 2Ch 6:21, also ´[[מְכוֹן שׁ]] 1Ki 8:39, 1Ki 8:43, 1Ki 8:49 = 2Ch 6:30, 2Ch 6:33, 2Ch 6:39, so Ps 33:14; ´[[מָכוֹן לְêש]] Ex 15:17, 1Ki 8:13 = 2Ch 6:2. Pt. [[ישֵׁב]] = subst., dweller, inhabitant, very oft. (c. 215 t.): e.g. [[ישֵׁב אהלים]] Ge 25:27 (J); oft. coll. [[ישֵׁב אהל]] Ge 4:20 (J), [[ישׁב הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 34:30, Ge 50:11 (both J), Ex 34:12, Ex 34:15 (JE); also poet. f., (as coll.; v. Dr on 1Sa 17:21) [[יוֹשֶׁבֶת שָׁפִיר]] etc., Mi Mic 1:11, Mic 1:11, Mic 1:12, Mic 1:13, Mic 1:15; [[יוֹשֶׁבֶת חִיּוֹן]] † Is 12:6, Je 51:35; similarly † Je 10:17, Je 21:23, Je 48:19 (cf. La 4:21) Zec 2:11; with [[בת]] in app. (Da:§28 R. 6), [[יוֹשֶׁבֶת בַּת־מִחְרַיִם]] † Je 46:19, so Je 48:18; more usu. pl. [[ישְׁבֵי הֶעָרִים]] Ge 19:25 (J), cf. De 13:14; [[ישְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ]] Ex 23:21 (JE), cf. Ex 15:14, Ex 15:15 (poem in E); [[ישְׁבֵי תֵבֵל]] Is 18:3, [[יוֹשְׁבֵי חָָדֶל]] Is 38:11, etc.; [[ישְׁבֶיהָ]] Le 18:25, Le 25:10 (H), Nu 13:32 (P); abs. [[יוֹשֵׁב]] (coll.) Am 1:5, Am 1:8, Is 49:19; [[הַיוֹשְׁבִים]] 1Ch 9:2; also (strangely) [[ישְׁבוֹת הארץ]] 1Sa 27:8 = the populations of the land We Dr (elsewhere in this sense only fs. and poet., v. supr.); freq. in phr. without in habitant (i.e. so that there shall be no inhab.), [[מֵאֵין ישׁב]] Is 5:9, Is 6:4, Je 4:7, Je 26:9, Je 33:10, Je 34:23, Je 44:22, Je 46:19, Je 51:29, Je 51:37, Zep 2:5, Zep 3:6; [[מֵאֵין יוֹשֵׁב בָּהֶן]] Je 48:9; [[מִבְּלִי ישֵׁב]] Je 2:15, Je 9:10; [[לאׂ יִהְיֶה יוֹשֵב בָּהּ]] Je 50:3; [[לְבִלְתִּי]] [[הֱיוֹת־בּוֹ יוֹשֵׁב]] Je 51:62.

of a land or city, sit, abide seated in its place, fig. for be inhabited Je 17:6, Je 17:25, Je 50:13, Je 50:39, Ez Eze 26:20, Eze 29:11, Eze 36:35, Is 13:20 (‖[[לאׂ תִּשְׁכּוֹן]]), Zec 2:8, Zec 9:5, Zec 14:11; [[יׇֽשְׂבָה תַּחְתֶּיהָ]] Zec 12:6, Zec 14:10; Ez Eze 35:9 Kt is [[תישׁבנה]], Qr [[תָּשׁוֹבְנׇה]]; Co [[תושׁבנה]], i.e. Niph. [[תִּוׇּשַׁבְנׇה]] (cf. Eze 36:10), or Hoph. [[תּוּשַׁבְנׇה]] (cf. Is 44:26); of palace, [[וְאַרְמוֹן עַל־מִשְׁפָּטוֹ יֵשֵׁב]] Je 30:18.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נוֹשָָׁבָה]] Je 6:8; 3 pl. [[וְנֽשְׁבוּ]] consec. Ez Eze 36:10, [[נוֹשָָׂבוּ]] Ez Eze 26:19, [[נוֹשָָׁבֻ֠ה]] Je 22:6; Pt. f. [[נוֹשֶׁבֶת]] Ez Eze 26:17 ( < [[נִשְׁבַּתְּ]] LXX Co, √ [[שׁבת]]), [[נוֹשָָׁבֶת]] Ex 16:35; pl. [[נוֹשָׁבוֹת]] Ez Eze 12:20, Eze 38:12; —be inhabited, of land Ex 16:35 (perh. = be habitable), Je 6:8; of cities Je 22:6, Ez Eze 12:20, Eze 26:19, Eze 36:10; [[חֳרָבוֹת נוֹשָׁבוֹת]] Ez Eze 38:12; — Ez Eze 26:17 v. supr.; Eze 35:9 v.

definitions.title: Qal 4.
Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[וְיִשְּׁבוּ טִירוֹתַיהֶם בָָּךְ]] Ez Eze 25:4 and they shall set their encampments in thee (LXX SyrVer Co [[וְיֵשְׁבוּ]] inhabit.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[השִׁיב]] Ezr 10:14, sf. [[הוֹשַׁיבַנִי]] La 3:6, Ps 143:3; 1 s. [[הוֹשַׁבְתִּי]] Le 23:33, [[שַׁבְתִּים]]([[וֹ]])[[וְה]] consec. Ho 11:11, Je 32:37; [[וְהוֹשְׁבוֹתִים]] consec. Zec 10:6 (Kö:i, 413; but prob. txt. err., vid. Thes and Ges:Lgb 464; rd. prob. [[וַהֲשִׁבוֹתִים]] as v:Zec 10:10, so Sta:ZAW. 1881, 21 We), etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וֵיּוֹשֵׁב]] Ge 47:11, [[וַיּוֹ֫שֶׁב]] 2Ch 8:2, Ps 107:36; sf. [[וַיּוֹשִׁיבַי֠נִי]] 1Ki 2:24 (Kö:i, 414. 224); [[וַיּשִׁיבֵם]] Job 36:7; 1 pl. [[ונּ֫שֶׁב]] Ezr 10:2, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הוֹשֵׁב]] Ge 47:6; mpl. [[שִׁיבוּ]]([[וֹ]])[[ה]] 1Ki 21:9, 1Ki 21:10; Inf. cstr. [[שִׁיב]]([[וֹ]])[[ה]] 1Sa 2:8, Ne 13:27; [[הוֹשִׁיבִי]] Ps 113:8 (Ol:§ 123 d; rd. [[בוֹ]]-, v. Che); Pt. abs. [[מוֹשִׁיב]] Ps 68:7, cstr. [[מוֹשִׁיבִי]] Ps 113:9 (Ol:l. c. Ges:l. c.);—

cause to sit c. acc. pers. + [[על כסא]] 1Ki 2:24, 2Ch 23:20 so (without [[על כסא]]) + [[לָנֶחַח]] Job 36:7; set, place c. acc. pers. + [[נֶגְדּוֹ]] 1Ki 21:10, also v:1Ki 21:9, v:1Ki 21:12 ([[בְּראׁשׁ הָעָם]]).
cause to abide (acc. pers.) at ([[ב]]) 1Sa 30:21.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: cause to dwell, c. acc. pers. + [[ב]] loc. 1Sa 12:8, 2Ki 17:6, Ho 12:10, Ge 47:6, Ge 47:11 (P), Le 23:43 (H), La 3:6, Ps 143:3; [[בְּאֶרֶץ תַּחְתִיּוֹת]] Ez Eze 26:20; acc. pers. om. 2Ki 17:24, 2Ki 17:26; acc. pers. + [[שָׁם]] 2Ch 8:2, Ps 107:36; acc. pers. + [[עַל־הַבָּתִּים]] Ho 11:11 (but rd. [[וַהֲשִׁבׂתִים]] We); acc. pers. om., c. [[עם]] pers. 1Sa 2:8, Ps 113:8; [[מוֹשִׁיב]] [[יְחִידִים בַּ֫יְתָה]] Ps 68:7 causing solitary ones to dwell in a house (or is [[מוֹשִׁיב]] for [[מֵשִׁיב]] Bae?); c. acc. pers. only [[עֲקֶרֶת הַבַּיִת]] ´[[מושׁ]] Ps 113:9 giving a dwelling to her that is barren of house; abs. c. [[לָבֶ֫טַח]] Je 32:37, Ps 4:9; abs. c. [[כְּקַדְמוֹתֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 36:11. On Zec 10:6, v. supr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cause cities ([[עָרִים]]) to be inhabited Ez Eze 36:33, Is 54:3.

marry (prop. give a dwelling to, cf. Ps 113:9), only Ezr Ne, and only c. acc. [[נׇשִׁים נׇכְרִיּוֹת]] strange or foreign women Ezr 10:2, Ezr 10:10, Ezr 10:14, Ezr 10:17, Ezr 10:18, Ne 13:27; so [[השִׁיבוּ נׇשִׁים אַשְׁדֳּו֠דִיּוֹת]] Ne 13:23.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהוּשַׁבְתֶּם לְבַדְּכֶם בְּקֶרֶב הָאָָרֶץ]] Is 5:8 and ye be made to dwell alone in the midst of the land. Impf. [[הָאׂמֵר לִירוּשָׁלַםִ תּוּשָׁבָ]] Is 44:26 he who saith of Jerusalem, she shall be inhabited. Ez Eze 35:9 v.
